about_the_game:
Missed out on the Halloween event and you don't want to wait for it to roll back around next year? This pass will permanently re-activate the Halloween update and unlock Flash for good, allowing you to go back to the seven levels of the Halloween event and take Flash into the main campaign! Includes the following:

- Access to the Halloween event level pack (it's in the event tab)

- Permanent and immediate access to Flash Telington, the boy from beyond with the tricky teleburst

Note that purchasing this does NOT complete the Halloween event's seven levels, it merely re-opens them and unlocks Flash. For skins and achievements, you'll still have to play through them all.

Warning: This DLC pass exists exclusively to re-enable access to the event for those who have missed out on it and don't want to wait until next year for it to return. The Summer event lasts from October 15th to October 31st every year, be sure to check the current time and date before purchasing this DLC so that you don't end up spending money on something you don't need. This DLC will not provide any benefits that can't be gained in the base game whenever the event returns every Summer.

name: Dimension Quest Pinball Event Pass - Halloween

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Dimension Quest Pinball Event Pass - Halloween - $1.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Dimension Quest Pinball Event Pass - Halloween

short_description: A pass to bring back the Ghastly Halloween event, giving you access to Flash and the event level pack not just for a few weeks, but forever! For purchase by anyone that missed the event.
